products.name: InvoiceSpectrum
products.description: InvoiceSpectrum is an automated invoicing module for Billing and/or EHR subscriptions, Payment Plans, Membership Processing, HL7, CSV, and SFTP integration. It provides auto-generation of invoices, task management, sales force productivity analysis, and financial performance management.

products.name: AutoCollectSpectrum
products.description: AutoCollectSpectrum automates traditional collection methods with a seamless, cost-effective auto-collection process using decision rules, secure messaging, and automated notifications.
products.cost: Custom pricing based on service plan

products.name: WorkflowSpectrum
products.description: WorkflowSpectrum is a cloud-based business process management module with form building, document management, event-based notifications, and real-time tracking.

products.name: MessageSpectrum
products.description: MessageSpectrum is an automated messaging module handling denials, PCP issues, Coordination of Benefits, Pre-existing condition updates, and secure communication.

products.name: HRMSpectrum
products.description: HRMSpectrum is a cloud-based recruitment and employment management module. It includes vacancy posting, candidate evaluation, document management, timesheet, attendance, and leave tracking.
products.cost: Custom pricing based on organization size

products.name: ProductivitySpectrum
products.description: ProductivitySpectrum is a monitoring tool that offers time tracking, compliance benchmarking, performance analysis, daily reporting, and audit tools for workforce productivity.

products.name: RPASpectrum
products.description: RPASpectrum is a robotic process automation (RPA) solution for automating repetitive tasks in healthcare, including payment posting, data extraction, audit management, and claims processing.

products.name: SupportSpectrum
products.description: SupportSpectrum is a client support module offering client management, support ticket tracking, knowledge-based FAQs, automated updates, and client notifications.

products.name: ChargeSpectrum
products.description: ChargeSpectrum is a complete hospital rounds module for visit types like home health, chronic care management, PQRS integration, secure billing, and document management.

products.name: CommunitySpectrum
products.description: CommunitySpectrum is a self-service support platform that allows users to create and manage articles, share knowledge, tag content, and provide help desk solutions.
